channel.title: Checking A While Statement

item.title: Checking A While Statement
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

i just need someone to check this while statement:

while(PlayerHasRunes == true) { CanAutoCast == true; }

im learning the real way to code java and i just wanted to make sure that im doing this right.

Read full topic
